sentences.en: Arcane nullifiers recognize Common, but only an experienced tinker, shouting out the correct codes, may command them.
sentences.cn: 虽然奥术消除者被认可为是公民，但只要是一名经验丰富的修补匠，高喊出正确的指令，就可以命令它们。

sentences.en: Because he is a tinker, and a poor man, he is despised, and cannot have justice.
sentences.cn: 因为他是个补锅匠, 是穷人, 所以被人瞧不起, 得不到公正的待遇.

sentences.en: Congress is likely to tinker with it, probably soon.
sentences.cn: 国会可能会很快对该法案做出部分修订.

sentences.en: He doesn't care a tinker'sdamn what others think.
sentences.cn: 别人如何想法他毫不在.

sentences.en: He likes to tinker ( away ) at broken gadgets.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢摸弄坏掉的小器具.

sentences.en: He likes to tinker with radios.
I had a tinker at your radio, but I can't mend it.
sentences.cn: 我把你的收音机修了一下, 但没修好.

sentences.en: It is not enough to tinker at the edges; our objective must be to reconstruct the entire system.
sentences.cn: 只在外缘做一些小修小补是不够的，我们的目标必须是重建整个系统。

sentences.en: It isn't profane any more to say tinker's dam.
sentences.cn: 说‘tinker'sdam’这样的话不应再被看作是一种‘亵渎’.

sentences.en: Other scientists tinker with Darwin by borrowing a page from the creationists'book.
sentences.cn: 其他科学家借上帝创造宇宙论者们书中的片言只语来修补达尔文的理论.

sentences.en: Please don't tinker with my car engine.
sentences.cn: 请不要乱弄我的汽车发动机.

sentences.en: The tinker passes the alley every day, crying out for business.
sentences.cn: 小炉匠每天都从巷子里过, 吆喝着做生意.

sentences.en: Tinker Taylor drank off his glass and departed.
sentences.cn: 补锅匠泰勒把他那杯酒喝完了就起身走了.

words.tran_cn: 做焊锅匠；焊补；笨手笨脚地做事

phrases.phrase: not give a tinker's curse (或 cuss 或 damn)

trans.tran_cn: 补锅匠，修理匠，流浪者，吉普赛人
trans.tran_en: in the past, a tinker was someone who travelled from place to place selling things or repairing metal pots, pans etc
